# MitM Attack Prevention

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to build Certified Secure™ Man in the Middle Attack Prevention in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, release, and monitor lifecycle of MitM Attack Prevention and detect MitM tools like Charles Proxy, BURP Suite, NMAP, MitM Proxy, Wireshark, Metasploit and more, fast. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/hc/en-us).
